name: The Shooting Boys
description:
!!!Chrome Will Say This Is A Threat But Continue Downloading It!!!

The Shooting Boys is a very early access game and still has many things that need to be added so your feedback is greatly appreciated! To leave feedback leave a comment on this game or join my Discord server where I post updates on current games I am working on.

Things To Come: 

Quit Button

More Weapons

Enemies 

Levels

Escape Menu
